task.title: How to Add Numbers
task.shortdesc: The instructions for using the addition feature on the JPS Calculator app.

prereq.p: You must have the app installed and opened to add numbers.

result.p: The result of the addition equation is displayed.

example.p: You need to add 2 and 3. The equation is 3+2=1. Press 3. Then select (+). Press 2. Then select (=).
The result 5 appears on the screen.
